Plan B includes CoAEMSP Sim Requirements (Infant NAT Trauma, Geriatric Sepsis) — confirm Sim Req documentation process for first session.

templates.title: Sheep Pluck Lab and/or ACLS Prep Stations
templates.review_notes: Week 5 Day 2 file not uploaded in Group 13 records. Two possible configurations: (1) Sheep pluck lab with Dr. Kat — requires her ER schedule availability AND specimen delivery confirmation; (2) ACLS prep stations if sheep pluck not yet scheduled. Sheep pluck window spans mid-S1 airway arc through mid-S2 — placement determined by whichever variable (Dr. Kat schedule, specimen availability) resolves last. Confirm before semester start.

stations.format_notes: Sheep lung/cardiac dissection lab. Requires: Dr. Kat (Medical Director) availability + specimen delivery confirmed. Half class in sheep pluck, other half ACLS practice stations, then swap.
ACLS algorithm and skills practice for half-class not in sheep pluck.
